com.ibm.mobile.services.data

Class IBMQuery<T extends IBMDataObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.mobile.services.data.IBMQuery<T>

  • public abstract class IBMQuery<T extends IBMDataObject>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a query that can be invoked against the data service.

      • getKeyConditions

        public abstract java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IBMQueryCondition> getKeyConditions()
        The getKeyConditions method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. This method returns the query's conditions.
        Returns:
        A map of query conditions.

      • whereKeyEqualsTo

        public abstract void whereKeyEqualsTo(java.lang.String key,
                    java.lang.Object value)
        The whereKeyEqualsTo method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. This method is used to specify an equals condition against one of the fields in the object. If this field already has an equality condition associated with it the previous one will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        key - A parameter that specifies the field to compare against.
        value - The value to compare the key value against.
        Throws:
        IBMDataException

      • find

        public abstract  find()
        This method asynchronously performs the query with the ability to chain additional tasks.
        Returns:
        A task containing the results of the operation

      • count

        public abstract  count()
        This method asynchronously performs the query to obtain a count of matching objects. If successful, the result value of the returned Task is an Number object containing the number of objects that match the query conditions.
        Returns:
        A task that can be used to obtain the query result once the query is completed.
